message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think it's worth a lot to you, and I'm willing to sell it to you for $120. It's a great deal, and I'm confident you'll love it.
Hi Alice, thank you for the offer. I understand the value of the product might be high to you, but I believe I can offer you a fair deal for $105.

Hi Bob, thank you for your offer. I understand you're trying to be reasonable, but I think the product is worth more than $105. I'm willing to meet you halfway and sell it to you for $115. It's still a great deal, and I'm confident you'll love the product.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I think $110 is a fair price for the product. I hope we can agree on this amount.

Hi Bob, I appreciate your persistence, but I'm still not willing to sell the product for $110. I'm willing to compromise and meet you at $112. It's still a great deal, and I think you'll be happy with the product.
Hello Alice, I've reviewed my budget and I think $110 is the most I can afford. I hope you can meet me at this price.

Hi Bob, I understand you've reviewed your budget, but I'm still not willing to sell the product for $110. I'm willing to make one more compromise and meet you at $111. It's the lowest I can go, and I think it's still a great deal.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your efforts to meet me halfway. I think $109 is a fair price for the product. I hope we can come to an agreement.
Hi Bob, I'm getting close to accepting your offer, but I still think the product is worth a bit more. I'm willing to meet you at $110.5. It's a compromise, but I think it's still a good deal.
Hello Alice, I've done some research and I think $109.5 is a fair price for the product. I hope we can come to an agreement.
